events.message: I ordered a jacket two weeks ago, but it doesn't fit at all. I'd like to request a refund since the size is completely wrong.
The system identified the issue as a refund request based on customer keywords like 'refund' and 'wrong size'.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket due to size issues.
Hello! I'm Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket that didn’t fit.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
Thank you for the quick response. My order number is 78654321. The jacket is unused and still in its original packaging.
Thanks for the info. We will initiate your refund once we receive the returned jacket. I will send you a prepaid shipping label shortly.
That sounds great, thank you. I appreciate the prepaid label to make returning the jacket easier.
The prepaid shipping label has been sent to your email. Please return the jacket and the refund will be processed within 5 business days after receipt.
Just following up to check if you have sent the jacket back and if there’s anything else we can assist you with regarding your refund.
Yes, I mailed the jacket yesterday using the prepaid label. Looking forward to the refund, thanks again!
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
A short satisfaction survey has been sent to you. We would appreciate your feedback on the refund process experience.
I completed the survey and rated my experience as very positive. Thanks for the smooth handling of my refund.
The refund case has now been closed. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
